K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-0: @138a bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-6: sa d'a a'a nu gra ha dharme /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-7: bee shra ba na ba re barti ta dharme /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-8: sarba k'arya pa ri pra ma na dharme /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-9: sa ma t'a pa ri brta na dharme sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-10: aom pra dzny'e shru ti smri ti bi dza ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-12: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-044:138a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
